document_data.name: Tooktook
document_data.mainbody: '''Tooktook''' was a [[duergar]] living in [[Mithral Hall]] during the reign of [[Haerinvureem]].
document_data.Relationships: While Mithral Hall was controlled by [[Clan Bukbukken]], Tooktook was from [[Clan Trilk]].
document_data.History: After the death of the [[shadow dragon]], Tooktook was killed by [[Bruenor Battlehammer]] in the outer tunnels. Later, Bruenor used Tooktook's name to deceive two [[dwarf|gray dwarves]] from [[Clan McUduck]].
